name: d3-timezone-scale
description: d3 scale component using a specified timezone name

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -o build/timezone-scale.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/timezone-scale.js -c -m -o build/timezone-scale.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/timezone-scale.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/timezone-scale.js build/timezone-scale.min.js
